Product Title: Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz

Store: Bouquet Garni
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:5a1f001511c47e51512c7544aeef60f4]] if you like a musky scent, then this soap is for you. it lathers well (see video) and has a somewhat strong musk scent; not overly strong, but definitely not light. did not dry out my skin. packaged well in a box; pump has a safety guard that doesn't allow the pump to be pressed until it's removed.
Review Title: lathers well
Rating: 4.0

Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
nice set of spray bottles!! I used it to mix/dilute bleach and other chemical products that needed to be in new, unrecycled bottles. sprayer works fine, although one of them did leak when i turned the bottle upside down. not sure if that would happen with all the bottles, or just this one sprayer that i received. if you have other "plastic" spray bottles around your house, it will be easy to forget that this one is GLASS, so just be careful.
nice set of glass bottles!!

[[VIDEOID:b3f95d0500123286d6c86e59790a77bd]] i appreciate a product that has a safety foil, so thumbs up for that! nice, clean scent, that reminds me of cucumbers. a thick, almost gel like consistency; doesn't lather very much, but still leaves face feeling fresh, clean, soft and smooth!
nice scent, gentle cleanser

profile:
The user maintains a strong focus on high-quality, value-oriented personal grooming products, particularly in skincare and hair care. Their recent purchase of a body wash with a unique fragrance and effective cleansing properties underscores their commitment to self-care, especially considering their sensitivity to certain ingredients. The user continues to value product features such as gentle formulation, appealing scents, and reliable packaging, which enhance their grooming experience. 

Their feedback on the body wash highlights their appreciation for products that perform well, providing sufficient lather without drying the skin, while also incorporating thoughtful safety features in packaging. This aligns with their established preference for reliable and effective items that uphold their high standards.

In addition to personal care, the user shows a sustained interest in versatile and practical household items, with an inclination towards eco-friendly choices. Their previous acquisitions, including refillable spray bottles, further reflect a commitment to sustainability and resourcefulness, complemented by an exploration of DIY solutions.

Overall, the user's behavior illustrates a steadfast dedication to quality, sustainability, and comprehensive solutions for both personal grooming and home management, alongside a growing interest in diverse fragrance experiences that enhance their holistic approach to self-care.
